Recommendations: the department of biology should comply with the guidelines defined by the university manual of operations in extension familiarization or reorientation of the guidelines may be conducted

the designed extension program and projects should be based on the needs and problems of the adopted communities a need and problem assessment survey should be conducted and its results should be utilized as baseline information for designing the program and projects

continuous and regular monitoring and evaluation of the extension projects should be undertaken a system for monitoring and evaluation extension projects may be devised appropriate instruments for monitoring and evaluation may be developed
more faculty members of the department of biology should actively participate in its extension and community involvement projects and other related activities
the adopted communities should actively participate in the planning implementation monitoring and evaluation of extension projects
the department of biology should endeavor to generate additional funds for its extension program and projects
wider dissemination of its extension program and projects should be made
a systematic and continuous documentation of the extension program and projects and other related activities should be pursued vigorously
